- 2+ years of work experience in creating backend applications (advantage is knowledge in cloud technologies Go, NSQ, AWS, Docker, basic Internet and web protocols eg. HTTP, JSON, RESTâ€¦ It is not necessary to have high expertise in all, but knowledge and interest in learning are preferable)
- Experience in databases - SQL Server and MongoDB are a plus
- Managing with the UNIX/Linux environment
- Experience in code versioning tools (Git)

**Youâ€™re gonna get:**

Working for us you get a Macbook Pro, flexible working hours, paid lunch (classic and vegetarian) while in office, and, best of all, if a holiday falls on a Tuesday or a Thursday, then Monday or Friday are free extra days of vacation. Personal growth of our employees is also very important to us, so we offer you free books, and sponsor going on workshops, educations and conferences.

Oh, and if you didnâ€™t already hear, according to a very interesting research by Hacking HR and Netokracija on what software engineers expect from Croatian employers, we have entered the circle of top 20 IT employers in Croatia, so if you are interested in what it looks like to work with us, feel free to contact us at careers@minus5.hr and introduce yourself to us in the form that suits you best.
